data.text:
Join the dots correctly to trace out Ibn Batuta's travel route.
Click on the dot to see the line appear. Start from the red dot.
data.feedback: Yes, Ibn Batuta did visit this place. Where did he go from here?
Oh no! He didn't go there next.. Try again.
Oops! That wasn't his next stop either.

That's correct. This place was visited by Ib. Where else did
he go?
Where did he go from here?
That's correct. This place was visited by Ib.
